objects.name: Analytic 0642
objects.description: Suspicious querying of organization-wide directory data via Google Workspace Directory API or Outlook GAL sync in high volume from abnormal users, service accounts, or unknown device contexts.

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: gcp:audit
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: Directory API Access: users.list or groups.list

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: m365:unified
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: GAL Lookup or Address Book download

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: azure:signinlogs
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: Unusual Token Usage or Application Consent

x_mitre_mutable_elements.description: Set thresholds for excessive use of 'users.list' or recursive group enumerations.
Flag non-admin or previously unseen user agents requesting directory information.
Distinguish between sanctioned sync tools and unauthorized scripts or OAuth tokens.
